name: The SimpleCasualGame
description:
Hello this is the humble lunch of my first "Complet" 3D game. a Simple Casual game like the name said. because some time we just want to relax and play a cube. the game it self is finish and polish and need no more update. 

Improvement may be done to change the file format that will not affect the game and is compatibility.

My next goal is to release the game on android. 

( Made Using Unity Personal)
